sections.title: Quantum Intent & Constraints with Cursor + ML Analysis
rules: Define what you are building with quantum-enhanced clarity: name, purpose, functional goals, non-goals, stakeholders, user impact, and business rationale. Use Cursor + ML to refine intent statements with AI-powered analysis, probabilistic optimization, and governance compliance.

Explain why it matters with exponential intelligence: business value, technical necessity, and human factors. Leverage Cursor + ML to identify additional value propositions, optimization opportunities, and predictive insights.

Specify constraints with quantum precision: environments, languages/frameworks, performance budgets, expected load, and security/privacy requirements. Use Cursor + ML to analyze constraint implications, suggest optimizations, and ensure governance compliance.

sections.title: Quantum Planning & Repository Structure with Cursor + ML Intelligence
rules: Create a file map before coding with quantum intelligence. Use Cursor + ML to generate optimal repository scaffolds with intelligent structure recommendations, governance compliance, and predictive optimization.

Check for existing components with AI enhancement before adding new ones; use Cursor + ML to identify reuse opportunities, refactoring possibilities, and governance-aware optimization rather than duplication.

Maintain a clear hierarchy with comprehensive documentation. Use Cursor + ML to generate complete documentation, structure explanations, and governance-aware organization with probabilistic confidence scoring.
